ygData.subject: Re: AC & Agility
ygData.msgSnippet: Very good points Xela. I was going on the assumtion that the choices were more damage or more AC and Agility with both choices being more or less a
ygData.messageBody:
Very good points Xela. I was going on the
assumtion that the choices were "more damage" or "more AC
and Agility" with both choices being more or less a
mutually exclusive thing. =) Warriors tend to complain
that they don't do enough damage. Know that was true
of palys and warriors before(haven't heard it since
they upgraded damge).<br><br>Agility is an often
ignored stat. The dex in the bracers are way worth the AC
loss though unless you're soloing. You'll do a bit
more damage, be better with the bow and proc damage.
(I say you'll do more damage b/c you'll swing a
little faster.)<br><br>Mind slipping at the moment but
believe you said you were Ranger right? So bow kiting is
probably a concern. (Course I know plenty of rangers that
don't do it. Don't see why not. A well timed snare/bow
pull can get off 3 to 5 shots before you even get back
to the group)<br><br>shooman out
